testcase.brief: Verify that the PPSK schedule function on GM accommodated the non- consecutive weekdays.
testcase.description:
Pre-Condition:
Test Procedure:
4. Configure a PPSK SSID on HM, using GM for PPSK validation; set a user group, password auto generated with a schedule specifying non- consecutive weekdays and configure some user accounts by index 1-10. 5. Push the config to the AP. 6. Configure a PPSK user role on GM, with the same schedule. Configure 10 user accounts of the PPSK user role. 7. Try to connect to the SSID using the user accounts on GM. [result 1]

step.desc: 5. Push the config to the AP.
6. Configure a PPSK user role on GM, with the same schedule. Configure 10 user accounts of the PPSK user role.
7. Try to connect to the SSID using the user accounts on GM. [result 1]
